metadata.title: CVE-2021-47354 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/sched: Avoid data corruptions Wait for all dependencies of a job tocomplete before killing it to avoid data corruptions.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
